name: YouTube Super Sized (Bigger Video)
description:
This makes youtube a lot cleaner.

The bonus is a bigger video player and the details panel and comments section next to each other under the video.

There are a hand full of things I removed from the interface that I found unnecessery.

*Updates*  
[06/12/08]
Style Fixed to work with the new video player ratio and website width.
Plus front page has been fixed.

[18/12/08]
Video page details and comments sections fixed
